author: Simon Difford
description: More about the theatrics involved in its making than the taste of the finished drink.
name: Absinthe Drip Cocktail (Czech method)

recipeInstructions.text: PLACE sugar cube on a slotted absinthe spoon resting across the top of the glass
POUR the absinthe over the sugar cube into the glass
LIGHT the absinthe soaked cube and leave to burn and caramelise
Using a bottle of chilled mineral water with a small hole in the cap, DRIP water over what's left of the sugar so it dissolves and drips into the glass
